sections.heading: to 12-15-7 - Expired.
sections.text: Expired provisions.— Sections 12-15-1 to 12-15-7 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1993, ch. 271, §§ 1 to 7, have been omitted from the NMSA 1978 since the constitutional revision commission expired after filing its report pursuant to 12-15-4 NMSA 1978 prior to the convening of the second session of the forty-second legislature.
